name: Utter Chaos
description: Saying "hello" to your neighbor? You just might burst into flames, turn into an alien, or both. This mod adds a chance for random outcomes to every action in the game.
downloadWarning: This mod is just for dumb fun. You should not be using it in saves that you care about, because anything can happen at any moment (including death). Do not report issues to mod creators while you have this mod installed.
